resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/73729</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>73729</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>a4e20e7e-9c29-11d8-aef7-889628b8efa3#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Katonai hadrend, 18. század</string>
            <string language="en">army corps, 18. century</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Armeekorps, Jahrhundert 18.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">corps d'armée, siècle 18.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">corpo da armada, século 18.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">corpo dell'esercito, secolo 18.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">στρατός σώμα, αιώνας 18,</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">cuerpo de ejército, siglo 18.</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Katonai vonalak a 18. században. A 18. századi háborúkat ilyen vonalakba felálló katonák vívták</string>
            <string language="en">army lines in the 18. century. Wars in the 18. century were fought by soldiers deployed in such lines.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">vonalharcászat,  háború,  18. század,  hadművészet,  </string>
            <string language="en">line-tactics,war, 18. century, warcraft</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Armezeilen im Jahrhundert 18.. Kriege im 
Jahrhundert 18. wurden von den Soldaten gekämpft, die in solchen 
Zeilen entfaltet wurden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">lignes d'armée en siècle 18.. Des guerres
en siècle 18. ont été combattues par des soldats déployés dans de
telles lignes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">linhas do exército no século 18.. As 
guerras no século 18. foram lutadas pelos soldados desdobrados em 
tais linhas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">righe dell'esercito nel secolo 18.. Le 
guerre nel secolo 18. sono state combattute dai soldati schierati in 
tali righe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γραμμές στρατού στον αιώνα 18. Οι πόλεμοι 
στον αιώνα 18, διεξήχθησαν από τους στρατιώτες που επεκτάθηκαν
σε τέτοιες γραμμές.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">líneas del ejército en el siglo 18.. Las 
guerras en el siglo 18. fueron luchadas por los soldados desplegados 
en tales líneas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zeile-Taktiken, Krieg, 18. Jahrhundert, warcraft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la ligne-tactique, guerre, 18. siècle, warcraft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">linha-táticas, guerra, 18. século, warcraft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">riga-tattiche, guerra, 18. secolo, warcraft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γραμμή-τακτική, πόλεμος, αιώνας 18, warcraft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">li'nea-ta'ctica, guerra, 18. siglo, warcraft</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:Panem Kiadó
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>590</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>73729</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>

    </item>
  </manifestation>
